document.masterDocTitle: An updated catalogue of the Histeridae (Coleoptera) of Sardinia, with faunistic, zoogeographical, ecological and conservation remarks *

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An updated catalogue of the Histeridae (Coleoptera) of Sardinia, with faunistic, zoogeographical, ecological and conservation remarks *

subSubSection.paragraph:

Tempio Pausania ,

.
Ecology. Usually found in cow dung and, secondarily, in horse dung; seems to be associated with hill/ mountain habitats.

Notes. In Penati and Vienna (2005 , 2006a ) some data are erroneously indicated: the locality of capture of the two specimens from Seui (CGMü), as “Senis”, and the data referring to the specimen from Nuoro (CUL), as “Punta Serpeddì, 1937, coll. Museo Genova” (see “Data collection”).
